name: Associations
definition: Predator-prey; host-parasite, pollinators, symbiosis, mutualism, commensalism; hybridisation, ...

name: Behaviour
definition: Covers actions and reactions of organism in relation to its biotic and abiotic environment.

name: Biology
definition: An account of the biology of the taxon. E.g. behavior, reproduction, dispersal

name: Conservation Status
definition: A description of the likelihood of the species becoming extinct in the present day or in the near future.

name: Cyclicity
definition: A state or condition characterised by regular repetition in time.

name: Cytology
definition: Cell biology: formation , structure and function of cells.

name: Diagnostic Description
definition: Distinguishing feature of this taxon from its closest relatives.

name: Diseases
definition: Diseases of organisms

name: Dispersal
definition: Dispersal strategies and mechanisms

name: Distribution
definition: Distribution, as per TDWG SPM ontology

name: Ecology
definition: Ecology, as per TDWG SPM ontology

name: Evolution
definition: Phylogenetic information relating to the taxon

name: General Description
definition: A comprehensive description of the characteristics of the taxon

name: Genetics
definition: Including karyotypes;

name: Growth
definition: Rate; parameters; allometries

name: Habitat
definition: Includes realm (e.g. Terrestrial etc) and climatic information (e.g. Boreal); also includes requirements and tolerances; horizontal and vertical distribution;

name: Legislation
definition: Legal regulations or statutes relating to the taxon.

name: Life Cycle
definition: Obligatory developmental transformations

name: Life Expectancy
definition: The average period an organism can be expected to survive.

name: Look Alikes
definition: Other taxa that this taxon may be confused with. Common in invasive species communities.

name: Management
definition: A statement about the level of need to manage a taxon which can be related to a piece of legislation, e.g., a CITES list.

name: Migration
definition: Periodic movement of organisms from one locality to another (e.g., for breeding)

name: Molecular Biology
definition: Molecular Biology, as per TDWG SPM ontology

name: Morphology
definition: The appearance of the taxon (is it only external?); e.g. Habit; antomy (thee branch of morphology that deals with structure of animals)

name: Physiology
definition: Physiology, as per TDWG SPM ontology

name: Population Biology
definition: Includes abundance information.

name: Procedures
definition: Deals with how you go about managing this taxon; what are the known threats to this taxon?

name: Reproduction
definition: Reproduction cues, strategies, restraints

name: Risk Statement
definition: Includes invasiveness, impacts

name: Size
definition: Average size, max, range; type of size (perimeter, length, volume, weight â€¦)

name: Taxon Biology
definition: An account of the biology of the taxon.

name: Threats
definition: The threats to which this taxon is subject.

name: Trends
definition: An indication of whether a population is stable, or increasing or decreasing.

name: Trophic Strategy
definition: Include nutritional aspects, diet, position in food network.

name: Uses
definition: Use, as per TDWG SPM ontology
